Complimentary umbrellas are available to sign out nut can be a little bulky to carry around all day, so maybe buy a collapsible one which is small enough so as not to be a pain. The hotel is directly across the road from the  famous Raffles Hotel ( Singapore Sling sgp$33)and Raffles City Shopping Centre. Good cheap food on 3rd floor in food court. You are reasonably…

94.review_text: we stayed here for a night before joining a cruise and had a day room after leaving the cruise and before flying home. Excellent hotel - helpful staff, comfortable room, big walkin shower, reasonable food. Good position.

95.review_text: A well-appointed hotel with a great location. I stayed here twice in my travels, each time in a different wing. Facing the check-in desk, the rooms above the lift on the right are newer, more elegant and better appointed than the rooms on the right bank of lifts, which are more basic and, I assume, less expensive.

96.review_text: Check-In was easy, Lobby has very nice pieces of art, room was laid out well, convenient location next to great restaurants, the gym had a lot of equipment, and the hotel breakfast buffet is fantastic! A lot of airline crews stay here.  I came out here for a business trip, and this hotel was recommended by the client. It did not disappoint.

97.review_text: Took 5 members family to visit Singapore for the first time.   Orchard is out since shopping was not on the agenda.  So decided to be  centrally nearest to where we wanted to go.   Carlton is right in the middle of key destinations: MBS, Merlion, Esplanade, China Town, Bugis, Chjimes etc.  it is surrounded by major historical + 6 stars hotels like Raffles, Fairmont and Kempinski.    Rooms are new with modern amenities.  Breakfast was great.  Service was great but still can be improved.

98.review_text: nice hotel. the location is close to the mall such as the Bugis junction, mustafa, the orchard road with an MRT ride. pretty strategic hotel access. good food and food choices. friendly hotel staff. not wrong choice of place to stay for us

99.review_text: Stayed here for a business trip.  First impressions are great - a large and welcoming atrium.  Check in was pretty slick and the news that I was “upgraded” to an Exec room was a nice touch.  The room itself was far from Executive... Tired decor, bashed furniture where the doors and drawers didn’t close properly.  The bed was comfy though and bath room clean - shower ok.  Used the Exec lounge for breakfast for a few mornings. Day 3 I was asked as usual for my room number and lm’m told I had to go downstairs for breakfast as I wasn’t allowed in the lounge . I tried to explain to the lady that I had been here the past two mornings and my colleagues (who were also upgraded, had been allowed entry). I didn’t want to cause a scene so I left, but annoyed at the same time.  Managed to…

100.review_text: Stayed in this hotel last part of long trip. isn't realise how big this hotel was. first impression was just breath taking. we had a lot of luggage as we walked in the staff  quickly got a trolley and helped us with the luggage as we booked in. From this point we were made to feel very special, this hotel is a very busy  but that is how you are treated from the point of arrival till you leave. ALL staff at the hotel are so friendly only too willing to help with any questions or advice.The room was fantastic very comfortable one of the best beds we had slept in in seven weeks. The breakfast is a foodies heaven there is everything you could imagine. Hotel location very easy walking distances too shops, restaurants, entertainment  we were very sorry to leave and could not had…

Capri by Fraser Changi City Hotel, Singa.address: 3 Changi Business Park Central 1 Capri By Fraser Changi City, Singapore 486037 Singapore

1.review_text: We have recently stayed at Capri by Fraser, Changi City for 2 nights in late March and it turned out to be one of the greatest experience we have in a local hotel.  From the moment we checked in, to the services provided by Housekeeping, help rendered by the in-house Technician, the experience was really top notch and all I can said is that it was an awesome experience throughout.  Shout out to especially Zakiah (front desk) & Justin (Housekeeping).  You guys are really great!!!   Keep up the good work!!!

2.review_text: Good place for a family staycation. Clean & cosy room with kitchenette. Nice breakfast. Easy booking of facilities (Gym & Pool). Due to capacity requirement, the pool and gym are not crowded nor nosy ;) Good value!!

3.review_text: Awesome service from check in to check out. For a fact that although I did not state in the reservation that I’ll be celebrating our anniversary. The lady ask and scheduled a cake to be sent the next day. Thank you so much. And when I alighted from the taxi, a guy came to help me to pull my bag seeing the amount of stuff I carried. For that also thank you.   Breakfast service was prompt.  Room is spacious and clean, ease of booking for facilities and hotel is conveniently located beside a mall.

4.review_text: All the front desk staffs is very helpful especially Kamsani. Susi.  Sophia. Zakiah. Athira. Yani they always help me whenever I ask for assistance...leslie always help with booking of the gym.  Will recommend all my family and friends to stay here

5.review_text: Rate:4.8/5 Price:$$$ Awesome stay @caprisingapore   Capri by Fraser is located in Changi Business Park. It is a new hospitality concept designed to meet the evolving needs of today’s E-generation traveler.  We arrived very early in the morning, with the intention to leave our bags at the concierge and head off to Pulau Ubin. We were greeted by Mas, a very friendly concierge staff. After taking our temperature, we headed to the check-in counter. We met Fherzana, a very amiable and customer-centric staff. The usual check-in is at 4pm but Zana said she would try her best to arrange at 2pm. Then she went through the different hotel facilities and explained to us booking would be required due to Covid-19. She took the initiative to check with us and arranged a slot for the pool, steam room etc, as she told us the bookings usually run out fast. In the midst of all these, she told us that she would upgrade our rooms to deluxe studios, as the rooms we have booked were not available. And all these were done quite swiftly.   When we returned around 130pm, we were surprised that one of our rooms was ready to check-in. Zana told us she will try to get ready the other room, which was ready around 230pm.   As you can see from the photos, the room is spacious. There is a small kitchenette area to do simple cooking. And guess what we did for breakfast? My next post!  I loved the selection of the toiletries. The bed linen was soft and the pillow firmness was just right for me.   There is a good size gym which I didn’t get to use it. The swimming pool water was warm, I think it was due to the warm weather that day. The sauna and steam room were good and clean. There is a “spin & play“ room on every floor, where you could do your laundry and enjoy some games like Kinect for #xbox360 or a good massage by #ogawa massage chair.   During our checkout, we were again greeted by Zana and Mas. where Zana came to where we were seated and just to ensure our stay was good. We praised her for her professionalism.   Capri is a perfect getaway to rekindle the special connection with your partner and friends, or just wanting to have the “me time” vacation.…

6.review_text: Went for a birthday staycation, and the room was beautifully decorated, we even received a complimentary slice of cake. Staff were all very accommodating. Room was clean and had everything including a microwave, stove, pots and pans. Bathroom was clean and roomy (and even has a spray hose)!

7.review_text: Room felt rundown wasn't properly maintained. Carpet was hard to step on. No slippers was provided. Overall cleanliness of the room was good. Location was OK. A mall besides with lots of restaurants and eatery.

8.review_text: Booked through Klook using SRV for my husband’s birthday. We are blessed given a complementary room upgrade to premium king room with bathtub on 6th floor. The room is spacious and clean. Well decorated for the occasion & given a sweet treat. We took the Masterchef package with steak as main menu. The recipe is pretty easy to follow, just that it can be improved by labelling the containers of each ingredient to avoid confusion. Another minus point, we think the microwave doesn’t work well to heat the food (not sure if it is spoilt or we operated it incorrectly). Oh, we also love the massage chair here!! Looking forward to swimming time tomorrow. Overall, we are happy with our 1 night staycation. Thank you all staffs in Capri by Fraser! All of you have done a good job! Keep it up!

9.review_text: Booked 1 nite stay for my dad’s birthday surprise. Was upgraded to a premium room which was spacious and clean. Special shoutout to Suriya for the arrangements and Athira for the beautiful deco in the room. Not forgetting the complimentay birthday cake. Staffs were very welcoming and check in/out was a breeze.

10.review_text: The hotel room is not very fantastic. View was not good even with the highest floor.   no bathtub, foods still need to self prepare.  stool in the bathroom is dirty also.  the kettle was spoilt.  This was a staycation for my family.  was expecting better quality as it's from Fraser but end up very disappointed.  Even my family also said not worth the price.  Only got 1 mall which is Changi City Point.  and night time, no 24hrs store to buy anything.

11.review_text: Capri is an international trusted brand, wherever you book. Stayed in Capri in Johor, KL and Singapore, and all three is never a disappointment. Capri Changi Point accepted my last minute stay request and all arrangements are made without any fuss. Thank you and i look forward to another stay in the near future.

12.review_text: Excellent service from Mr Vicky. Very friendly person as well. Very knowledgeable person when I ask questions to him and he answered well. Thanks for your superb service.Keep it up.Hope to meet you again next time.👍

13.review_text: Being regulars at this venue, our most recent stay was highly disappointing. Staffs were not approachable nor sincere when dealing with our queries. They did not take the initiative to inform us on the new procedure of not providing complimentary tickets. When questioned about the recent change, they were dismissive and just defensive claiming that it is not on them since it has been featured on the booking website. They then just referred our case to the manager, who happened to be nice and apologetic but by then, emotions were high and the damage is done. We also had to be charged for a parking fee of 20-odd dollars which could have been avoided if they had notified us upon checking in. Moving forth, the check in time was also an issue for us. They issued us a late check in…

14.review_text: I have a relax short break at Capri, and I wanna thank you Zak and Athira give a good service and both of them very friendly. At first I get a upgrade room while I check in, after walk in to the room I saw a balcony, I dun like it and request change to my premier room, just within 10mins i get the new room, very efficient 👍

15.review_text: I just cannot express how astonished i am with Capri service. From the moment we walked in, everyone was just simply amazing. A malay male if i remember is name is Rezal who opened the door greeted us with a smile and also assisted us for check in. He was very patient with our question as it was our first time staying. Rezal was well trained and to my surprise that he is actually the manager there.  We were so fortunate to have him assisting us. Room given was very spacious i would say eventhough we didnt get the bathtub room.  We didnt managed to use the pool as it was raining however the mall beside has a handful eating outlets. Room bed was very comfortable however the aircon can be better if the temperature can be adjust as it was pretty much cold at night.We called up for…

16.review_text: Inaugural stay at Capri, Changi City. Fuss-free check in service and thankful for the free upgrade. The room was spacious with a nice view of the pool. Request for high floor was met. Cheerful staff indeed. Will definitely be back!

17.review_text: Great that the hotel has a booking system to ensure the pool is not overcrowded but was devastated when I could not book a slot. Saiful the attendant at the pool went out of his way to call guests that had booked the pool to confirm their bookings and turned out that a couple cancelled their booking and as a result my son and I got to use the pool. Saiful was also attentive to help out when he saw me having trouble to turn on the jacuzzi! 5 star service from a great staff!

18.review_text: Used a travel voucher with staycation here. I didn’t have much expectation as this is more of a business hotel in Changi. What surprised me is the staff are well trained! They are knowledgeable, eager to help and courteous. I can say that they are better trained compared to other 5 stars luxury hotels in Sg and overseas! Zakiah helped me with my check-in which was efficient and she highlighted a few info I should note especially when there is no complimentary parking here. Athira made my checkout a breeze. I love the app to book facilities and made other requests. There is daily housekeeping (compared to others like pan Pac) without you having to ask for it.

19.review_text: If you drive and plan to have staycation here, please reconsider.   The reason given is that car park is not managed by the hotel.   Have the hotel management ever think of an arrangement with the car park owner to simply provide this simple request?

20.review_text: Booked 2 X Studio Premier King room for 2 Nights and had emailed in to Capri to request for the rooms to be on the same floor as we are celebrating my parent's 41st wedding anniversary and my birthday.   Sulastri from Capri promptly replied and noted on my request and informed that they will prepare something for us (very sweet of them). Had a few enquiries prior to our staycation and they were promptly replied by Siok Peng and Say Hui.   The check in was very late (at 4pm) but we do understand that they have to clean the rooms (plus each rooms has kitchenette with pots and plates that needs to be washed and clean) therefore it took longer than pre-covid days.   Fortunately, we did not have to wait long. Didn't even remember waiting. Was quickly ushered to the reception to check…

21.review_text: Hotel is located nearby Changi City Point where you can shop and dine in. The hotel is also family friendly with swimming pool, loaning of board games/ play station too.  The mini kitchenette is also a plus point as you can prepare something light or microwave some food.

22.review_text: Good hotel service, the pool attendant Saifulnizam pre-empt me when there’s a available slot and also constantly wishing us happy anniversary with his cheerful self. Thumbs up to the good service your staff have displayed. Thank you!

23.review_text: Thank you front office team for assisting from checkin till the day I depart. Clean and spacious room, got upgraded as it is the non peak period. Zakiah check us in & she was very patient with us with all our queries. She was at the counter with Susi who greeted all of us. they were very friendly!  Shah from housekeeping took care of our room for our 4 nights stay & she is also friendly. I can't wait to be back & till then guys!  KEEP IT REAL!  :)

24.review_text: My first time staying at Capri By Fraser and I’m amazed! Didn’t expected a hotel located in the East amongst office buildings would be as good.   Check in was such a breeze, served by Ms Susi. She was very friendly, pleasant and welcoming, went through the process with us and explained everything that we need to know without having to ask. Such passionate individual, unlike some at other places who just do it for the sake of doing it. That’s a plus point!   The room was cozy and lovely and the hotel is so convenient with the mall with many eateries just next to it!   Thank you for making our stay a great one!

25.review_text: We had the opportunity to stay the night at Capri last weekend. I must say the room is spacious & clean. It is also conveniently located next to ChangiCity Point mall and situated not far away from Changi Airport.  But I must say the real star lies with the quality of it's staffs. Checking-in was a breeze, quick & efficient. Thanks to their friendly front-desk staff (Ms Zakiah), (Mr Kamsani) & (Ms Athira). They even helped us secured the swimming pool usage booking during our check-in. I must say overall Capri staffs from front-desk to it's Door-man to it's security employees are friendly, helpful & kind.  We will definitely return for another staycation series at Capri.  Kudos guys !!!

26.review_text: amazing hospitality, from the first day of stay, room was extremely nice, and staff was very friendly, attend to all of our needs, I really enjoy the room, it made the whole stay a memorable one, breakfast was really amazing, the staff that served us put a smile on our faces, and very friendly, hope to try out the swimming pool soon, I got a free upgrade for the room for my anniversary, really enjoyed it❤️, they even gave a free cake in the fridge, overall my stay is really the best, thank u for the kind service

27.review_text: It was my birthday celebration that my wife surprised for me. And I really enjoyed the hotel amenities. In fact, we got free upgrading room! Well done , Kamsani and Susi for the warmth welcome! Will look forward for next staycation here. Xoxo

28.review_text: Front desk staff is great thanks to SUSI, KAMSANI & ZAKIAH AND DUTY MANAGER Rezzal and thanks to concierge Leslie for assisting with my luggage. EVERYONE IS FRIENDLY! nice swimming pool. added service the spin play room which I can conveniently do my laundry!

29.review_text: Staff able to attend my needs by providing a new card as my access card left in the hotel room. Staff name a.k.a Susi Sally...    Really appreciate the service rendered promptly.  Would recommend Capri hotel to others and my friends

30.review_text: Very good, nice room, friendly staffs. Sunny, Susi, Yani, Sophia, Athira always assist us like family! Great team, dont feel like leaving! Will bring my family here to stay when the covid situation ease!

31.review_text: First time staying, nice and pleasant stay. The rooms are clean and staff are friendly as well. Wide range of facilities available for convenient booking through a QR code. Will definitely come back again in the future!

32.review_text: Splendid service rendered by Mr Rezzal and staff. Enjoyed our stay here!   Beautiful and stylish decor. Room was very comfy and spacious. The staff at the restaurant was accommodating and we felt very welcome.  Will definitely be back!

33.review_text: Thanks to Susi for making our stay great! We asked for early check-in and we got it. As we stayed in the West and have never step foot on Changi Business Park, Susi assisted us on nearby places to get great food. And also shout out to Zakia for helping my parents on the carpark coupon as it was a little confusing for them. This was my first stay in Capri and won't be the last.

34.review_text: My husband and I chose to stay in Capri for our Anniversary recently. We were attended by Ms Susi and Ms Zakiah during our stay and they were impressive! They made us feel welcome and assured us of our safety despite of the global pandemic. We were so happy to receive the room amenities and a cake too! We’ve been here a few times before for its convenience and we’ll definitely return!

35.review_text: Did a staycay with my husband for his birthday weekend. Since it was a free stay given by Amex, we had really not much expectations. However we forgot to bring the voucher along and Sunny was very understanding to check us in first and allowed us to bring the voucher before we check out. Along the way he greeted us everyday and even remembered our room number.  Also, thanks for the upgrade. We really had a good time :)   The hotel's location was also very ideal with all the necessary amenities right at our door step.   Parking rates was also very reasonable.

36.review_text: I would like to recommend your staffs, Kamsani, Zakiah, and Mas. Their service is top notch and we truly appreciate their outstanding service. Eill definitely come back again and recommend to family and friends.

37.review_text: Stayed on January 27th, pleasant experience, seamless check in and out, we really love how outstanding the cleanliness they maintained every time!    Most importantly, the staffs were indeed helpful and prompt in micromanaging front desk duties. With COVID-19 guidelines measures they have to repetitively convey to every checking in guests, they deliver their service exceptionally well, effortless communication despite the don of masks and face shield. They were attentive to details and our ad-hoc requests. They did a hand over shift perfectly well without making us wait and it touches me to see how they still waited for us to bid goodbye!   Mr Kamsani, Ms Zakiah Hanim, Ms Yani and Ms Susi, thank you for making our first experience a lasting one that it did not took long we…

38.review_text: Had a great staycation at Capri's. Room was clean, facilities were acceptable, location was easily accessible and less than a minute walk to the mall with many food choices. Will definitely return. Commendable thanks to Rezzal for checking in on us too!

39.review_text: We had a wonderful break at  Capri. Hotel is quiet and very close to food and mall. Kudos to staff  Yani and Han at front desk who were friendly, very efficient and accommodating.  The bed is very comfortable - with adjustable control for firmness.  Room and bathroom is a comfortable size with lots of walking spaces. Even has a walkin change room - with space for luggage.

40.review_text: It was an enjoyable experience and we will be coming back again. Maybe the bathtub area could have been cleaner and the dishwashing liquid could have been replenished. Other than that, it is really comfortable and I enjoyed my stay.

41.review_text: Upon arrival today, there were hair found on the bedsheet. Not one strand but many small strands. The table is also very dirty. I called concierge and they sent housekeeping up. Changed the bedsheet.  Smart TV but basic connection to wifi also don’t have. All they have to do is connect the smart tv to wifi.   The room smells stale. It will also be good if there’s something to make the room smell pleasant. If I were the manager, I would hang an air freshener pouch in the room. It’s very cheap but it does a lot.  Ordered room service. I have ordered many room services in many hotels but this is the first time we get mediocre lukewarm chicken rice in a box, for $20.  I really think this hotel requires a lot of personal touch. This place has the potential if they make the effort.

42.review_text: My past experienced at Capri had been wonderful. Was greeted by friendly and approachable staff upon arrival. Even though i do not know how to use the Singapore discovery voucher, Han assisted me throughout the entire process. He is very patience to assist as I am not very tech savvy person.   The room was spacious and very clean. There’s a pleasant smell to the room which is very inviting. And to book the pool is very easy, I simply need to scan the QR code beside my bed and It direct me to Lola, a chat bot which help to secure my booking.   Overall i am very satisfied with my stay. Awesome job to Han the rest of the team! Keep it up:)

43.review_text: I booked the trip in January 2021 and was looking forward to my 2nd visit to Capri Changi City Point. I received a call from their rep, Say Hui saying that my booking need to be cancelled due to some unforeseen circumstances. Of course, I made her life difficult. I called and insisted that she did something that would be feasible to me. I gave her a really rough time. What was applaudable was she tried her very best to give me a room. I would like to thank her for making it happen as I promised my children the long awaited staycation.  I came and checked in. It was easy breezy. I was attended by the same cheerful and bubbly, Zakiah Hanim. The first rep I met during my first visit. She informed me that our room was being upgraded and yes there was a bath tub for me. 👍 what a…

44.review_text: 1. No free parking, atleast discounted parking charges would have been good. 2. Lola was not easily accessible.  3. Facilities booking should be relooked. 4. No sofa & coffee table for 2 single bed compared to 1 King size rooms. Since there is no difference in room charges, room Facilities shouldn't have any disparity. Major disappointment.

45.review_text: The standard of cleanliness is really bad. Carpets floor was dirty upon check in. The dust on the lamps very evident. Cups and spoons that were washed still had stains on them. I had requested for a firmer pillow as the ones given was less than 1 inch in height (at best because it was feather). Had an agonising 2 nights because the memory foam pillow promised by housekeeping never came. Not recommended to stay here and will not return.

46.review_text: It has been a good stay for 4 days 3 nights. Will definitely come back again during another holiday. My daughter enjoyed the stay over at the hotel. It has been a pleasant experience for me and family.

47.review_text: I was greeted with a friendly concierge but we are serve with unfriendly receptionist.. Ms maria.. however thru out the stay housekeeping Ms jehan and ms vivin is superb they really keep the standard of the room cleaniness is 10/10..  and also the receptionist Mr Han is super efficent and friendly he also deserve to be recognise... in fact we are greeted with Mr Mas the friendly concierge in morning when we out for our breakfast. The fast food outlet is nearby.. capri fraser hotel in changi is the best staycation ever.. through out our stay from 16/03/21 - 19/03/21 . Thank u for letting us create our own memories during this pandemic.. to all the staff countinue to serve the best service.

48.review_text: On 16 March 2021. We have book total 4 rooms for our beloved mother's wedding. Room 227 228 229 and 708 . we were attended by HAN AND ZANA .  We requested to have nearby rooms with each other. And they did very well to fullfill my request. We also got an upgrade as complimentary. We have a very great wedding with a great rooms and service. Someday will come back again. The balcony and rooms we got are spacious.

49.review_text: A family of 6 checked in 3 rooms for a night. Our purpose of stay was for a wedding event. We indicated in the Remarks as such.   We were so fortunate as our 3 rooms were given a FREE upgraded rooms at Level 2! Also, depends on the availability as told before hand and we were the lucky ones! I truly loved  the dark romantic interior of Level 2 looks exactly as advertised. We are truly grateful to Han and Zana from the bottom of our heart who have made our stay a memorable ones.   297 and 298 are bigger than 299. However all rooms at Level 2 have private balcony and a canopy! The beds are in the rooms are much wider than our standard king, can fit 3-4 people. Friendly staffs, quick at responding to calls and it’s was a welcoming stay.   Thank you once again to the babes of Capri!…

50.review_text: Love everything about this hotel.  Friendly reception and staff, clean and good size room and big bathroom. Very comfortable bed though pillows a bit too soft for me.  I love the location. It’s away from the crowds yet so convenient to get to places with the mrt just a short walk away.  I got a room with partial seaview and I could watch forever the planes flying towards the airport.  I ordered room service and really enjoyed the steak dinner.  Love The dressing table which keeps everything so neat and tidy.

51.review_text: Was cleaning my wallet and suddenly saw this tripadvisor card that was handed by your manager. Sorry to be givung a late review. All was well from day of check in. Receptionist Zakia was very nice and also gave us a free upgrade to a bathtub room. I called the hotel a day before and remember a malay guy who help us to arrange for a free cake as it was my wife birthday. Room was so spacious, if i remember correctly it was room 307.Tq Capri for a great stay.

52.review_text: Room was big. Bed was big enough for 3 persons. Location easily accessible and a step away from shopping mall.  Room floor was sticky and lots of ants though when we first came in. Requested to mop floor during housekeeping and it was so much better. Simple birthday wish on the bed for my daughter’s birthday and a small chocolate cake was a really nice and thoughtful gesture. Overall, great stay. Will definitely return!

53.review_text: At the start, the room is abit dissapointed, but afterwards the hotel manager took the situation and replace our previous room to a better one. Would like to thank the hotel manager for solving the situation.

54.review_text: Very satisfied with the level of customer service provided when I requested to do a pre registration for check in even though the time slot given for my check in time was at 5pm. I do thank your team for the hard work.

55.review_text: Never a regret to choose Capri Changi for our return staycation. Greeted by Mr Rezal who open the door for us.Showed us to scan in our trace together and temperature as well. When showed the way to check in... guess what! He then also assisted to check us in at the reception counter. Very professional and well mannered receptionist. He recognised that we stayed in Capri before and welcome us back upon knowing that(Guess he saw our past stay in your computer system). Very engaging and pleasant to talk to as well. We asked about Ms Sophia as she checks us in the previous time but Mr Rezal mentioned that she was on night duties and ask if he can pass the message to her. We told Mr Rezal that we were just so happy with his service so far that he informed us to write a feedback in…

56.review_text: Went to Capri by Fraser Changi City for a 3D2N staycay and am very impressed with the service provided. Friendly staff greeted us and allowed us to register earlier while we went on with the day activities.   On the second day, some slight misunderstanding happened and our dinner (unopened packets of instant noodles and eggs) were mistaken as rubbish and got thrown away. Service recovery was excellent, with the housekeeping manager on duty offered to purchase our misplaced items. The manager on duty then offered complimentary dinner at the hotel's restaurant.   Much gratitude to the staff who were very supportive and understanding throughout. Kept their service quality high.   The room is excellent too:)

57.review_text: It was supposed to be a birthday celebration, we were placed on the 7th floor and the moment we’ve arrived we can hear some noises as if there was some construction and debris are falling to our ceiling and to the glass window, we did not complain at first night but it was already a horrible experience and we were not able to relax and sleep soundly, now let me tell you another scary experience on our 2nd night, since we cannot stand the noise on our ceiling and glass window as if there were some rocks falling from somewhere... the duty manager proposed to transfer us to the 9th floor and yes to be fair he did say there is no guarantee that there will be no noise at all, and we said okay we can try and transfer instead. On that 2nd night we slept early like pass 12 midnight, …

58.review_text: I am looking forward to have my staycation at the Hotel again and yet again. My appreciation to all the staffs for the excellent  services rendered to us and making us have all the good quality time and place to enjoy.

59.review_text: The stay was great however for the parking of my motorbike was abit of an issue as we didn’t get complimentary parking.so we have to pay roughly about $24 per night for my parking which was abit much and that made me worry for my next stay if i would for say stay a week or more there

60.review_text: It had been a great 3 days and 2 nites stay. We will make our return in September 2021 to celebrate our 37th wedding anniversary. Sweet sleep with comfortable pillows. Capri has a beautiful interior decoration and Capri is also located very near the Changi City Point where we also get to shop.

61.review_text: Definitely recommended hotel for staycation. Stayed for my SHN and was very satisfied. The in room dining is great and many food delivery options nearby. rooms came with an induction stove. Definitely would come again

62.review_text: It is a pleasant experience staying in this hotel. Service are good from Front Office to Concierge and most favourite In-Room Dining service. Each food in the menu i tried and none disappoint me.  Room is amazing with a balcony. TV channels are good with movies, sports and news. No regrets.

63.review_text: My stay in the hotel was amazing with great customer service by Rezzal and his team and the food is marvellous. My 14 days SHN stay was perfect and smooth one. All were taken care of to check in till check out.

64.review_text: Amazing experience at Capri by Fraser, Changi City. I got the deluxe studio and it was clean, well maintained and spacious. So much plus points considering the price point. Bathroom was clean and spacious as well. Loved the kitchenette, but met with a bad odour from the fridge. Had no such odour issues during my first stay months ago. But overall, still amazing. Good location as despite it not located in the city, it still has good options in the mall for food and some shopping. Also, it is one mrt stop away from Changi Airport. Good place for a staycation that is out of the city.

65.review_text: My family love the whole hotel experience. It was really worthwhile our time staying at the hotel. The whole staff were friendly right from beginning to the end. Everything that was presented to us was very good as it exceeds our expectations. The fact that the hotel is located  next to Changi City Point is a plus.

66.review_text: Hotel staff is really good and attention to details. Room is big and clean. Food is good and very tasty. Hotel near train station and shopping center. Local good food is easy to find. Checking in is breeze

67.review_text: Stayed here due to Amex comp voucher. Everyone in the hotel was really friendly and tried to go above to meet service expectations. Room is of good size and not too crowded too on a weekday. They are really sticky with check in & out time though, but not an issue to us.

68.review_text: Room was large and comfortable. Bathtub was very relaxing. Swimming pool is easily booked and quite large. However, found a chicken drumstick bone on the floor during our stay. Wondering how it was missed by the cleaning staff but perhaps it's a one off incident. Everything else was fantastic especially the service during check in and out and when booking facilities.

69.review_text: Location is next to MRT Expo station.  There is a shopping mall right next to the hotel.  Lots of restaurants, shops and supermarket.  The hotel is away from the city so a staycation here feels a little bit like getting away.  The external walls have cladding that contract and expand throughout the day.  They make loud noises which are noisy in the daytime but disturb sleeping at night.  There is also a lack of hygiene in the common area.  The big garbage cans at each floor's lift lobby were overflowing with garbage.  Nobody came to empty them for the whole day.  By evening the garbage was rotting and smelling.  Horrible!

70.review_text: The studio room is good for staycation, everything is prepared, just go there relax. The service of the people there also polite and friendly, recommend staycation place, the location also near Changi City Point and mrt.

71.review_text: Had a nice 4d3n staycation there during early Feb. Facilities value for money and staff overall friendly. Only gripe is after 11pm difficult to get a decent meal arnd the area (within 5 to 10 mins walking distance) worse during weekends whereby most convenience stores close as well and location of wardrobe near toilet. Service staff, Phillip, who tends the pool deserves a special mention for his excellent interaction n proactiveness for guests.Thanks to staff service level like him, I won't mind returng for another stay!

72.review_text: Breakfast was served by Carole who was very friendly and efficient with her service. Love her positivity and proactiveness in ensuring that the guests needs are met. Although the restaurant is no longer serving buffet breakfast, the set menu options are certainly sufficient to make one full.  Was also impressed by Alex who was in charged of front office. He is also very efficient in attending to any issues raised and made sure that the stay is comfortable. Definitely instrumental to the smooth running of the hotel's operations.  For people who are driving, do take note that the hotel does not cater for complimentary parking. Nearest parking would at Changi City Point Mall under one's own expense.

73.review_text: Nice place very peaceful easy for makan kakis like us... love the area very friendly staff and helpful hope to come back again next time... Hoping by the time pass by love to have halal food for the muslim staycation....

74.review_text: Thank you for preparing the cake for my birthday and the request to have abit more privacy on the highest floor.I really appreciate that and enjoyed my stay very much will be looking forward to it in future

75.review_text: This was my second stay at capri hotel, but this time during covid and the hospitality was excellent with warm smiles from check in to check out. Will stay again for staycation! Room requests were extremely prompt as well

76.review_text: We enjoyed our staycation here. The staff were very gracious and attentive, they also helped us with all our queries and last min requests. One thing though, they don’t provide complimentary parking which we wish we had as that would complete our stay.

77.review_text: Room cleanliness was above average except 'hidden' areas, e.g. inside the fridge where I chilled my drinks, behind TV set when I pulled it out to have better viewing angle from my bed. My room was next to Play and Spin room and sometimes I can hear people talking. Also annoying noise from ceiling occasionally and it could be from the air-conditioning ducts. I didn't use the swimming pool and Gym, because pre-booking of time slot was required during Covid period. Location is next to Expo MRT and Changi City Point Mall.

78.review_text: I booked a premier studio room for three nights. First, the room is not properly sound proved which I constantly heard noises from the ceiling. Further than that, I found short hair on the fresh towel on the first night (I have very long hair which clearly isn't mine).  I didn't report to the hotel right away because it was late, and I waited the next morning which I found another hair stuck on the shower bottle, and it looked like it has been there for a while because the water wouldn't wash it away. I told the manager I'd like to check out right away, and requested for the refund of remaining nights but got refused.  Overall, horrible services and sanitation.

79.review_text: Enjoyable staycation over the weekday. Staff are friendly and welcoming. Amazed with the digital concierge that allows you to book time-slot for the facilities and request for additional amenities. So convenient! Satisfied with my stay.

80.review_text: It's more like a studio apartment, This is a great place for a staycation. Good supermarts at the basement. You need to access it via the carpark. It's a good setup since it's at Changi City Point. Overall great place to live

81.review_text: Wanted to go for a much needed staycation to rest and rejuvenate. Did not regret choosing Capri Changi City Point as it was the most value for money among hotels of similiar pricing!  Room was really spacious and the hotel had the facilities that a traveller would require.  Special shoutout to Yani who kindly helped us with the locker locked-out issue!  From the occupant of Room 1232.

82.review_text: It is in a spot where there is a large shopping complex adjacent. Also, Changi is nearby.  Things went wrong during our stay, it was just that front staffs were not very polite or listened to our grievancea. it got resolved eventually. Not the greatest review, neither a bad one.

83.review_text: Lovely stay at Capri and made better with the wonderful service provided by Maria and Athira at reception who was patient accommodating and assisted us with our requests and made our stay more pleasant enjoyable and seamless from check in to check out

84.review_text: Did our first (and last staycation) of year 2020 in December 28-30. Had a pleasant stay in a beautiful and modern room. We booked under the Master Chef staycay so we had ingredients for beef steak prepared for us. It was so much fun! I strongly recommend this hotel for a stay away from the hustle and bustle of the main island.

85.review_text: One of the best staycaytion in sg! Clean & spacious rooms & most importantly friendly staff service! I would like to specially compliment Carole (the restaurant waitress) . She is very friendly & courteous , served us on two days of our breakfast ! She also went the extra mile to help us ask for the muesli recipe. She has made our dining experience at Capri such a enjoyable & pleasant one! Good job Carole & thank you!

86.review_text: I will call this hotel as a "no frills" hotel with a price Basic amenities to cover the basic needs.  Ideally located near business park and airport. Great for Expo too.  Changi City Mall provides a good avenue for food and purchase of other necessities.   However this place is not for Staycation purpose, as a family, we didn't have much things to do, no views.

87.review_text: Me and partner checked in 1 night to celebrate our anniversary here. Upon arrival everything that we see and received was mind blowing. We would like to thank the entire Hotel Staff, especially Mr Kam sani for taking good care of us and accommodating our needs.

88.review_text: Our check in could have been smoother as we were downgraded at first without much notice. I had to ask for my original room back as the downgraded room was super small. Not sure why we didn't get our initial room as paid for back in the first place. Breakfast did not have many options however the customer service was excellent, no doubt. One lady at Caprilicious was super friendly & hospitable! :) Games & DVDs free to rent at the reception too!

89.review_text: Quick review, dont stay in this hotel no parking, no service, front desk ignores the phone, no pool access (unless one of the lucky few told to book online days before arrival, unfortunately that means my very disappointed children have nothing to do now despite the beautiful day outside), no class, tied in to mediocre rooms spartan rooms and in a business park. Terrible. I look forward to checking out.

90.review_text: My first staycation at the Capri by Fraser was awesome.  The hotel teams rendered impeccable, caring, excellent and prompt service.  Thank you everyone at the Capri , who  made my  stay a memorable one.  I will definitely return to the Capri.

91.review_text: My husband and I went for a 1 night stay at Capri. It's located just beside Changi City Point with lots of eateries. The MRT station is also just a stonethrow away. We were greeted with a lovely note by Mr Hanafi, welcoming our stay with Capri. Our room was nicely decorated and we even got a yummy cake to be shared. They upgraded our room which we appreciated so much. It was spacious and comfortable. The room is even equipped with filtered water tap! Amazing! Special thanks to Susi too for being so friendly and helpful to us! Thank you Capri!

92.review_text: Just checked into the hotel to be greeted by a very impatient and grumpy receptionist named Amalina. Got to the room with smelly bathroom floor just mopped with a super stinky mop. The hook in the bathroom was loose. Very disappointed with the TV that was not smart at all!

93.review_text: I booked Capri by Fraser at Changi City, it was a big and comfortable room. There were a lot of amenities, such as movie loans, games, massage chairs. Different levels has different amenities. I am impressed and so amazed as this is my first time here in Capri. Also I was celebrating my husband’s birthday and they decorated the room so cute! Simple and nice. I love it! Definitely not my last time here.

94.review_text: The hotel check in is very late 4pm which is much later than any other hotel. Marina bay sand is at 1.45pm or any hotel 2 pm or 3pm.  Check out 12pm. Requested for late check out. They can only extend to 12.30pm.

95.review_text: First time encounter a hotel with a standard check-in time at 4pm.  Requested wine glasses from room service but was told to collect myself as delivery to the room will require a delivery fee.  Free bicycle renting require guest to wear shoe, no slipper. Can be better if a notice is put up to preempt.

96.review_text: The hub booked a night stay at Capri as we have always loved shopping at Changi City Point which is just really next to it. Lots of food to pack up and eat!   The lobby is bright, clean and welcoming. However upon reaching the 6th floor where our room is, we were greeted by a strong stale garlic smell. But when we reached our room we knew why! There was a stove and cooking utensil available and I guess guests could cook a meal if they want! The room was also having a kind of stale smell and we had to on the air con longer to lessen it.   Thank you to the hotel for the birthday decoration and complimentary cake!  We also had fun at their pool which you have to book in advance via the QR code in the room.   Overall the place is clean, well equipped and not a bad stay. Just that we…

97.review_text: Great location and service. Staff are all very friendly and attentive :) Massage chair and games available for use/rent. AI chatbot (Lola) was very useful as well, helped us to navigate the facilities available in the hotel. Had a wonderful stay here overall, thank you!

98.review_text: Kudos to Mr Kamsani and Mr Amirul who gave their best service. Not best but excellent. Capri is lucky to have them on-board their team. Well done guys !!! Can't wait to do alot of staycation. With excellent services provided by these 2 staffs will make us come back for more.

99.review_text: This Hotel providing good service and amazing hospitality. The room is clean and all acommodation here are exceed my expectation. The staff are all freindly and feel most pleasure for being stayed here with those great memories. Greatly recommended!! 5 star! Yeahhhhhh!!!!

100.review_text: Staff are all very friendly and helpful. Prices are reasonable. Very good food and near changi city point mall. New jewel and airport too. Definitely come back again for the food and stay.well done!!!

YOTEL Singapore Hotel.address: 366 Orchard Road Singapore Orchard Road, Singapore 238904 Singapore

1.review_text: Checked in on good friday. Took around 2hrs to check in due to the long queue..Room is very clean i would say, everything is working well..bed is cool able to adjust. Easy to connect laptop to TV with HDMI cable to watch youtube & disney+. Room is just nice for 2 pax, would definitely book here again!

2.review_text: No complaints on the location. It is very assessable to all big shopping malls.  The room is pleasant. good for solo or couple staycation the view is great due to the high floors. the internet is stable and fast.

3.review_text: Booked this hotel after reading the many good reviews left by guests.   Many thanks to the hotel to accommodate our request for adjoining rooms, the early check-in, and the birthday surprise delivered by Yolanda.  Many thanks also to Eswari and Aldrina for the patience shown in clarifying the parking charges. S$21.40 for a single-use exit pass regardless of the number of hours/days stayed.   The location of this hotel is very good. There are many big shopping malls and food establishments right beside it. The MRT is very nearby too.   The room layout is somewhat unconventional with the bathroom located right against the exterior windows. This means guests have to choose between privacy or good view and natural light.  It also means lots of curtains up/down. It will take some getting used to by some.  Our family has enjoyed our staycation with this hotel. Despite the abovementioned layout, the rooms are very cozy.   The Komyuniti Restaurant located at Level 10 is a good place to dine in also. It is doing relatively well despite the many Covid-19 restrictions in place. Their prices are reasonable. …

4.review_text: Great cool hotel for a staycation.  It is so convenient to walk everywhere on orchard road!  Though the room is a little small, the high floor makes up for it!  The breakfast was straight forward and quick service!  I love to hang out for drinks another time!

5.review_text: Views of Orchard Road were nice although it was troublesome to have to lower the blinds every time I needed to use the toilet.  Although futuristic, I was very disappointed by the bed.  When it was flat, I could feel a depression where the 'bend' of the mattress occurs.  It led to a very uncomfortable night's sleep.  For those who are sensitive to their mattresses, you may want to give this place a miss.

6.review_text: Awesome team at hotel. Complementary early check in and check out via self service touchscreen.  Clean and cosy room. Near Orchard MRT, Shopping Mall and cinema. 24 hrs cafe round the corner and 24hr convenient shop near by. Decent breakfast

7.review_text: The hotel is suitable for family. The location is fantastic. I would definitely recommend to my friends and family. Will come back again with my family. Although the room is small, it is cosy and compact.

8.review_text: Soft beds, breakfast not fantastic, gym size can put about 5pax, love the complimentary early check in, nice staff and free flow of water. Bed can be adjusted up and down with button, sensor lights for the room, know how to light up when you wake up, cabled tv channels but not smart tv, rain showers, good amenities

9.review_text: I love how the hotel are just walking distance to the shopping malls. It is super convenience, cozy and totally love the view. Would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends. I wouldnt mind coming to this hotel again!

10.review_text: Love the view at night from the shower area. Efficient layout for a small room roughly 14-16sqm. Amenities will good. Towels are clean, sheets are clean, bed are super soft. Its a happy place with purple grey theme. Similar to M social but much better.

11.review_text: It was a convenient and not over-priced hotel to consider within the heart of Orchard. With minimum contact, they have 2 cute robot, Yolanda and Yoshi to do the errands. Room is just big enough for 2 to 3 pax. Otherwise get the bigger room.

12.review_text: Overall the hotel room is quite decent. Staff are extremely friendly and quick to attend to your enquiry/request. Amenities in the room are fantastic, they have everything that you need like iron & iron board, umbrella, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, body lotion and hand wash.

13.review_text: Complimentary Early Check-in.. Very Clean Room - Thank you to the Chambermaid who cleaned up & prepared the room for my check-in.. 😀 Friendly & accommodating staff all around.. 😄 Super cute Yolanda & Yoshi... 🤣 Room Amenities are well stocked up & good... ☺️ Western Cold & Hot Breakfast range is Big & Yumms 😛

14.review_text: Hotel room was cool, I like the robots sing bday song for me, the city view was nice, the toilet floor is slippery after shower, the bed is recline so it’s new experience, but the blanket is full of dust fibers especially when we sit and move the blanket fiber dust start to floating around the air.

15.review_text: The hotel is newly built in 2017. There are 610 rooms. Parking is $20 per day or $3 per hour entry. There are 30 floor. Room temperature can only be set between 21 to 24 degree. You can ask for extra towel, mineral water, shaving kit again. Reception lobby and drop off area is located at level 2.   During check in you have to scan the qr code. Then the staff would direct you to the counter and assist you to check in. Need to fill up form and write in your full nric number (not last 4 digits) and date of birth. This is for all guests and visitors. Room floor and room number is already assigned to you. Similar to airline self check in system where you can't choose the floor or room. The lobby is like a touch and go station. No seat or sofa like other 4* and 5* hotels in Singapore.…

16.review_text: My family and I enjoyed our stay and we appreciate that we were assigned connecting rooms. That was a nice touch. Thank you for the complimentary early check in as well! We got to start our plans early. Wouldn’t mind making a second trip to Yotel in future. :)

17.review_text: This is one of the nicest hotel I've been in and I've stayed at expensive five star hotels before. Of course you shouldn't expect the greatest facilities or a huge room for the price you're paying. But the room is frankly amazing. I will definitely be coming back here

18.review_text: We were very impressed with d way breakfast was served as we did not have good service or food at Carlton Hotel.We were served by mdm Eileen who anticipated our needs even before we asked. The staffs at reception are very young but respectful.

19.review_text: Generally ok. Cups for brushing teeth not provided. Wireless screen mirroring intermittently disconnected. Wash basin outside toilet and shower require additional time to get used to. Room service for cleaning is provided only upon request.

20.review_text: I would like to express my sincere gratitude to the team especially Shahrul whom arranged for an upgrade as me and wife were celebrating our anniversary together. He was extremely nice and pleasant to talk to. Thank you very much for making our stay as comfortable and smooth as possible. It's only a day and we've already missed Yolanda and Yoshi! They were really helpful!

21.review_text: Enter next to Thai Embassy.    Swift check in and out. Room is small but sufficient. Retractable (hospital type) bed to save space. Safe provided. Ample toiletries, coffee tea, bottled waters in room. Clean sheets and towels. Full length window through the bathroom.  Lots of food and marts around hotel. Room service by robots. Cool, though not interactive.

22.review_text: Overall our 3D2N staycay experience was splendid and we enjoyed our stay in Yotel greatly. It was value for money and location is great as well. It was a birthday celebration for my partner.  We are thankful for the complementary early check in given and the great service by the staff. The room is small but we are not bothered by it as the toilet make it up for space and view. A robot- Yolanda came up to sing my partner a birthday song with macarons and card signed by the staff.  The gym experience was just good as well. It was an enjoyable stay and we would love to come back again next time. We love the robot too. :)

23.review_text: Quite as okay hotel for its price. But the shower is not suitable for 3 people. Should at least provide an extra blind outside the toilet to prevent others from looking inside while others are showering. As people may mistake this as a hotel made for couples for other purposes.

24.review_text: Choose the hotel as we have errands to run in orchard and the price was within budget. However, in the end we paid $40+ for parking. Which we can stay in a better hotel. No housekeeping done when we were out. Overall, not value for $ and definitely our last visit

25.review_text: Good location in orchard. Very accessible to ion, taka, shaw, tangs and many more. Room was very small. Cool bed. But room service need to improve. Requested for 2 face towels, waited for more than half an hour. Need to call a second time then send over 1 only. Should include the face towels in the room.

26.review_text: Excellent location, just behind main Orchard Road shopping belt. Hotel and interior furnishings looks new.  Rooms though small but efficient use of space. Despite lower price for Singapore hotels, still provides most amenities including toiletries, hairdryer, iron & ironing board, water boiler, safe and small fridge. Toilet is of good size, no need to shower beside the toilet bowl getting it wet and enough leg space in front of toilet bowl.  Wifi is easy to connect and fast. TV has free to air channels and many cable channels. You can also cast from your device to it with simple instructions on the TV provided. There is also a HDMI port on the wall beside the bed though I did not try it. A number of power points and USB power ports provided around the room.  Front desk staff…

27.review_text: Checked into this property with the purpose of having it as a staycation session for my boyfriend and I. We stayed here for 2 days and 1 night (checked in on 23/03 and checked out on 24/03). The rooms are beautiful, cozy and neat and the location of this property are conveniently accessible for transportation, shopping and for looking for food places. Also, their lift lobby are lit with the neon lights which are so pretty and the hallway suits the scene for filming a horror movie. Highly recommend this property and will be back there someday!

28.review_text: Location is great, right in orchard area. Bed was a little too soft for me. hotel is clean, staff are attentive towards my needs. overall, still enjoyed my stay here. price is reasonable, will come back again.

29.review_text: great place to staycay & the facilitiee is great over there too. had a very exp for two days and would totally recommend people to come with their family & friends. the facilities & amenities is great too.

30.review_text: Perfect location with wonderful service. The check in staff even noted it was my birthday month and had Yolanda (the robot) sent up some cookies. Nice touch to a pleasant evening. Will definitely stay here again.

31.review_text: Wanted to simply stay here due to the robots. Specially called to request for some small items to be delivered to us and I can say definitely the highlight of our trip.   Room wise-we know it is small. 3 adults to move around, it is a squeeze...but can’t complain as we know that’s what we have signed up for. Bathroom was okie, just that I think you need to be highly comfortable with one another as somehow, you would be able to the a bit of the silhouette of the person in the bathroom. At least it wasn’t an issue for us.   Bed was very soft. Need to find spots with not so soft bed. But number of pillows was definitely enough.   Highly recommended if you only need the hotel to sleep and rest. If you want to just stay in the hotel to enjoy the facilities...then I would choose other…

32.review_text: Since we have not utilize the SRV vouchers, we thought it would be nice to book a short staycation before the school reopen. I came across Yotel Orchard, which is in a nice location in Orchard, and it seems like a cool hotel, with the futuristic theme. The price was reasonable considering, it can sleep 3 persons and come with breakfast as well. We arrive slightly later at 3pm to check in, and there was no crowd in the lobby. We used the mission-control (manned counter) to check in, and pay an additional top up for the overnight parking which came up to be $21.40.  After checking in, we went to the 10th floor to book the time slot for the swimming pool. The pool is quite small, and with children playing in it, you have to watch where you swim.  The room was nice and clean,…

33.review_text: Located in the central area of orchard. The room is so cool. Breakfast is limited choices but it tastes yummy. The mission control team sent the robot to sing the birthday song for us which is so memorable during the stay. Thanks Yotel.

34.review_text: First Class Queen room - The Room was extremely small, not worth the price paid. There wasn't enough space to even open my luggage. The room was very small, the bathroom was extremely small. And the deck is not clean.

35.review_text: The bed is quite comfortable but the space is a bit cramp. If booked 2 rooms with connecting rooms, the interconnect doors are not able to stay opened. There is no stopper provided. The location is quite accessible to F&B outlets, however quite a walking distance from Orchard MRT station. Do check out the expiry dates of the items in the room, as some may be expired or near expiry. The overall staying experience is just ok.

36.review_text: Enjoy my staycation. First time i book this hotel. The bed is very comfortable...can watch my favourite korean show..they provide hair dryer n ironing stuff. The shampoo n conditioner is a quality one. Hope to comeback again.

37.review_text: Thank you team Yotel from the front desk to the komyuniti restaurant team. Everyone was helpful and took great care of my family with my mother in the wheelchair.  We got early checkin as our connecting room was ready about an hour before the scheduled check in time. Received a sweet surprise from Yolanda for our birthday boy and enjoyed the pool for the 2 nights stay. Proximity to amenities in the surrounding area means no shortage of food and activity...we even caught a midnight movie on our last night stay. And singapore being so efficient, everything was a grab away. But once again thank you team Yotel. You guys are awesome. My mother and kids gives a sign of approval so we will definitely come back. Highly recommended. Ps, remember to bring down the blinds when you want to…

38.review_text: Reason is simple, made a request for check out at 1pm was rejected. And then when I ask how about checking out slightly after 12noon, even like 1205, person name Sahrul on the phone at the front desk say NO.  Enough said for NOT accommodating for simple request

39.review_text: If you are planning a family staycation for 3 (8-10yo) and are able to and willing to afford the First Class suite for 2N ( no more ) this is an option. Suite is ok for 2.5 people no more than 3 adults, windows are ceiling to floor in the showerstall so lower those blinds or prepared to flaunt what you got! Be either early (before 8am or after 955/10ish am to avoid breakfast crowd) as minimally staffed. OK for the one off experience but not Round 2 for us.

40.review_text: Check-In was done in a swift. Staff at Mission Control was really friendly and explained clearly on the details, clauses. Room service was also efficient, met Yolanda, the robot :D Definitely made my day. Called in to Komyuniti to order some food to dine in the room before checking out. Despite several return calls due to some technical issues, not much delay to my hungry stomach, kudos to that! Food quality was good and thanks to all the prompt and good service, it made my staycation a really good one. Will definitely be back again!

41.review_text: We booked a family room with view and stayed for one night. TThe location is fantastic and we used it as our base to explore the area.  A lot of eateries and shopping ccentres.  Been to many places particular Emerald hill,  Orchard gateway library and wheelock 卓尔bookshop.

42.review_text: Check in was relatively easy. Acdonia (can’t rmb exactly) was very helpful and friendly and full of smiles. Cabins are small but location is good. With rediscover vouchers, definitely made it value for money.

43.review_text: The staff service from the reception area to restaurant was great ! Hotel WiFi was fast and automatically connected. The room was cosy, compact, very clean and well equipped with amenities and we were impressed by the special delivery by their cute robot, Yolanda.

44.review_text: Extremely warm and friendly welcome from Mission Control! Room was cosy and well-equipped. Urban skincare co. range pampered our hair and body throughout the weekend. Apart from occasional kids running and shouting along corridor, no other noise were heard from neighbouring cabins. Everyone wore a smile on their face and calls to Mission Control were answered on the first ring. Thank you for the wonderful weekend!

45.review_text: A nice hotel with great interior designs but it would be better if the divider of the room and the toilet or the glass door of the toilet can be covered for more privacy while showering or doing bathroom business as it was quite uncomfortable knowing that our roommates are able to see the figure of us showering as it was translucent.

46.review_text: Bed mattress should be replaced, Check-in process should be more efficient and your hotel staff should put in effort to expediate the check-in process, Food and drinks at restaurant is good, hotel location is good

47.review_text: Booked the hotel for staycation. Staffs are friendly and room was clean although it is small. Worth for friends but not recommended for family staycation as it is small. Overall, it was an enjoyable stay.

48.review_text: room is small. so if you prefer bigger room , sorry . The price is not too high is a plus, the small room cannot command too high price also. If too expensive, resident in future will not returned . The breakfast is good, keep it up. Maintain the food is served hot is a plus. Variety is abundant .

49.review_text: Staycation was ok. room safe clean. No greeting from service staff. No smile at all. Breakfast is good. A lot of selection. Room is comfortable. Morning noise level was noisy despite staying at 28 floor.

50.review_text: Great location nice view high floor. Would recommend to anyone that loves shopping . Easily accessible to halal food . I shall be back  with the whole family soon. Keep it up Yotel. Awesome hotel in the heart of the city and good price

51.review_text: Great Stay. Comfortable Bed. Great service. Cool robots. Clean environment. Variety of channels to watch. Great view from the higher floors. The staffs were very polite and kind. Room service was great

52.review_text: Good location, good customer service, cozy and clean environment.  Everything is good overall.   Although the cabin is small, you can find anything you may need there like iron, ironing board, hairdryer, slippers......etc.

53.review_text: very happy with the stay i had in Yotel! would recommend this if u want to get away from the hustle of singapore! the view was also very pretty from where we were and the overall atmosphere is pretty cozy!

54.review_text: I feel that the room is pretty much acceptable for the price but don't expect too posh settings. Minimalist setting with all the necessary amenities that a traveller or short trip will need. The toilet is more spacious than the room in my opinion.

55.review_text: Great Stay recommending to other family members & friends. Great stays.. Surrounds with lots of shops for shopping and meals.. friendly staff and sophisticated rooms. All safety measures with proper sop for covid. THANK YOU.

56.review_text: Pleasant short staycation especially for destressing moment during the pandemic.  Friendly,efficient and professional staffs. Awesome location for food lovers and those who loves the night life experience.

57.review_text: in overall, affordable stays suitable for staycation, place to rest/ relax. while the cabins do not have an absolute sound proofing, i have had a rather comfortable stay during my stay. it would be better if something could be done to it, as i could occasionally hear conversations from other cabins.

58.review_text: Room may be a little smaller than the usual hotel rooms, but makes it up in terms of innovative use of space and modern looks. Bed is comfy, though pillow is a bit too soft for my liking. Can be changed although I did not. Bathing facilities is awesome, and breakfast is filling and delicious, though all ala carte. Very convenient location to restaurant and bars along orchard road, and the feel is like staying at a city hotel overseas. Recommended!!!

59.review_text: Not over price hotel that provides the best bed and service! Property is so clean and amazing with the most convenient location. The stay makes me want to return to the property again and not forgetting Yolanda who is so impressive and cute. Good Job Yotel.

60.review_text: Though the cabins are small, there were ample walking space due to their smart layout. The rooms with view was fantastic! We celebrated my husband's birthday there and the hotel very kindly sent Yolanda (their robot) up to our room and sang a birthday song for my husband before presenting him with some macaroons and a birthday card signed by all the staff of Yotel! Very impressive!

61.review_text: Fast check in nice room and nice scennert, The room has many space saving features but albeit a little tiny. The view from my room with the city view was fantasttic and was able to get a good view of the southern singapore

62.review_text: Conveniently located beside orchard Shaw centre and 2 minutes walk to Orchard Isetan, Tang studio, ION, Wisma & Takashimaya. You can do your shopping or dining in orchard road or take bus / Mrt to anywhere you would like to travel in Singapore

63.review_text: Perfect place to unwind and relax. Highly recommended for couples for its convenience and space. Very smart way to save space and wasn't too congested. Breakfast menu has been enhanced and it was a good move. Body lotion needs some work. Some noise from the pipe during the night. Otherwise, perfect stay.

64.review_text: Nice location which is near to the MRT station, cozy hotel room and clean. But it kinda a little bit small and the bed a little bit soft. It would be perfect if the room a  bit bigger and the bed a little bit harder.

65.review_text: There for stay-cation and find that location is convenient.Good bird eye view from bathroom and toilet.Best of all,the room is clean and tidy. Food quality needs to improve especially their breakfast which is served cold

66.review_text: Yotel was great! Perfect for small families or couples. Location was great. Just behind shaw house. Room was clean, (I stayed on 24th floor) view was excellent. Only thing is Toilet door was frosted glass so could see into the toilet. No complains. Had a great stay!

67.review_text: Took the First Class Queen and loved the balcony and the view! The check in was seamless despite being the public holiday period and the check in staff was really friendly and polite. However, the bed was too soft so did not really sleep very well and also, should consider having non smoking balconies so those who cannot take second hand smoke can have the option of choosing that. If not, if the next door cabin guests smoke at their balcony, it will cause discomfort to those who do mind the second hand smoke.

68.review_text: Booked this hotel for a family staycation of 3 adults. Given the cabin room with bunk bed. Location is prime as in the heart of Orchard Shopping Belt.  Cabin room is well compacted but size is really too small for a family of 3 - very squeezy .

69.review_text: The price of the hotel and the service of the staff were fine. The rest of the stuff such as the cleanliness of the room and facilities were bad. Given 2 rooms but both were dusty. One of the rooms has plenty of insects. The bed was not comfortable and the pillow was too flat.

70.review_text: I booked a room for three, with a bunk bed on top. The hotel room looks small in picture in Agoda, however it is bigger than I think. Well arrange & organize, especially the toilet, clean, comfy & quite big.

71.review_text: Choosing a hotel has always been according to what you need for that specific period of stay. Upon arriving at the hotel, we were welcomed by a clean, quiet and sleek view of the lobby - self service kiosks on the left, robots on the right and service counters in front of us. The premium view bunk room is an experience, but slightly small for a 3 pax. Nonetheless, the high floor view on beside the bathroom/ toilet is certainly pleasing and satisfying. Don't forget to close the blinds before using though 😜

72.review_text: Will for sure recommand this hotel to my friends & relatives.I will come here again for my staycation🥰 Easy assess to any shopping area, nice food surrounding & easy assess to any public transport as well.

73.review_text: This was our first staycation since the pandemic started. We enjoyed our stay. The location is conveniently located just a stone's throw from Orchard MRT and the major shopping malls which line the area. I loved how simple the concept is. We felt safe throughout the check-in process. We loved the robots that delivered water to the room. It was my partner's birthday so it was a surprise when a robot delivered a birthday card for him. Absolutely would love to stay here again for a budget staycation in the Orchard area. Shop 'til you drop... into one of the rooms. Also, Komyuniti is a welcome surprise. Quiet ambiance. Great for a quiet date night. Kudos to the staff Vivian and those on their shift in early February... who were super friendly. Kudos to Yoshi and Yolanda, the…

74.review_text: I really like the adjustable bed and how comfortable it is. The view from the shower was nice too. Just that the aircon is not cold enough when we are sleeping and the swimming pool water is icy cold for me.

75.review_text: With the floor to ceiling bathroom windows in their cabins, the shower experience at Yotel was probably the most memorable. Their cabins were very simple, functional and fulfil their brand promise of only focusing on providing the essentials. I slept well on their mattress. Though I have to say that service standards here are rather unremarkable. The purple lighting used around the property serves as quite a backdrop for the now necessary Instagram shot when on staycation. Check-in and out was quick and smooth without much hassle. Recommended if you are just looking for a self-sufficient, simple and value for money staycation experience in a time when leisure overseas travel is practically not possible.

76.review_text: This is one of the best hotel I have stayed in Singapore.  Very cozy room, very clean and decent size bed.  It is centrally also located.  We had a fantastic view from our room.  Would definitely recommend Yotel.

77.review_text: Will come back again.  Location good  Nice to chill  Gym fantastic other than the cable machine still don’t have the handle .  Pool seems nice haven’t try . All come again to try.  Bed abit too soft due to wear and tear . But overall not bad

78.review_text: For 3 guests, you couldn’t find a better hotel at this price for such a fantastic location. Right next door is the start of the shopping belt Orchard Road. However, bear in mind that the rooms are really small. The so-called room with a view is when you have to keep the toilet door opened then you are able to have a view. Once the toilet door is closed, it is really that’s it! A cabin!

79.review_text: Positives: Great location, good food and quiet room. Will be back for short staycation at the crossroad of Orchard and Scotts roads! Negatives: Mattress too soft for me and lack of storage in the room. Not suitable for the claustrophobics!

80.review_text: Cheap and fantastic. Breakfast included for my package and it makes my staycation even more awesome. The design of the hotel is futuristic and something unlike the typical hotel. Definitely will go again.

81.review_text: This is the 2nd hotel in Orchard Road that i have tried in 2021 and is newer than the other one i have tried.   Was given Room#2814. Despite room size is small, everything in the room is neat and tidy.  Given a nice city view in the toilet but don't forget to bring down the bind before you do your business. Room door is thick thus i did not hear any noise from the hotel corridor. Nice smart bed that you can adjust the angle while watching TV on bed. Water pressure from shower head is good but the only issue i have is the glass toilet door. If you are staying with another person you be able to see him/her sitting on toilet bowl, as the toilet door cannot be closed fully. There are gym and swimming pool at Level 10 but did not book any slot to try them.  Did not opt for breakfast…

82.review_text: Clean and well maintained.hope to be back with friend in near future! Breakfast was awesome, staff are friendly.overall good experience. Check in and check out are smooth too, maybe is due to weekday.

83.review_text: nice hotel in good location with shopping & food places nearby.  Small rooms but neat & clean. Except for the bed which personally is not my type for soft mattress, I would rate the hotel good for a short stay be it leisure or staycation.  I would recommend friends to try Yotel for a staycation.

84.review_text: My kids loved Yoshi and Yolanda very much. Only thing is that Yolanda sings a goodbye tune but Yoshi just say good bye. Thus its better to get the female robot to deliver items to the room. It was raining in the 3 days we stayed there thus the water in the swimming pool was cold. But that did not stop the kids from going into the pool when the rain stopped for a while. Overall the kids enjoyed themselves.

85.review_text: Room was small upon first impression but the futuristic interior design was thought through, having smartbeds/tv to utilizing space very well (that a full-length ironing board could fit in without cramming the place). Full bottles of shampoo/conditioner etc were surprisingly provided instead of your typical small samples, and the toilet was so clean and cosy w a view of the cityscape and hot water (don't worry you can pull the blinds down for privacy when taking a dump).  YOSHI the robot was so cute and had a personality: It went, "May the force be with you" and "Hasta La Vista, baby". Didn't manage to meet YOLANDA though :( We had trouble trying to connect our device to the tv (it only streamed music and not videos??) so would be useful to have a thorough guide somewhere.…

86.review_text: I wrote my comments in the earlier section about the attentiveness to details such as housekeeping and check-in requests.  The location is perfect with its proximity to the station, variety of food and shopping needs.

87.review_text: It was indeed a perfect staycation, thank you to the girl that assisted us on the check in day. We were very pleased by her welcome and good customer service.Thank you once again for the wonderful stay despite the pandemic period.

88.review_text: a little problem with the door lock but security fixed it immediately. very good service. love the location. Nice view. It has all the amenities provided. Only the bed too soft for me. Would be good if they provide hand towel at side or they missed out ?

89.review_text: Staff were friendly and the stay was pleasant, with friendly and helpful staff. Room amenities were sufficient and the room was cozy and comfortable. We stayed for 2 nights in the room with bunk for 3 people, and spent a great time in the room. Would come back again!
